info.name: Thunderbird square tabs
info.description: Makes Thunderbird tabs square. Works with TB 38.
info.additionalInfo:
This was made with snippets of code picked up from this:
https://userstyles.org/styles/80683/thunderbird-australis-no-more
and this:
https://userstyles.org/styles/112435/thunderbird-numix-dark-australis-compatible
and this:
http://www.wilderssecurity.com/threads/update-thunderbird-15-0.331137/#post-2110991

I adjusted the paddings very slightly and combined the snippets, nothing else.
